meanings.definition: A book with blank pages for sticking in photographs, clippings, and other mementos.
meanings.sent1: I made a scrapbook for my best friend's birthday with all our photos.
meanings.sent2: She keeps her memories in a scrapbook to look back on.
meanings.sent3: The scrapbook of adventures was a treasure trove of laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a scrapbook of memories, each page filled with moments frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The scrapbook overflowed with colorful snapshots of happiness and love.

meanings.definition: To create a scrapbook by compiling photographs, clippings, and other mementos.
meanings.sent1: I love to scrapbook my travels to remember all the fun I had.
meanings.sent2: She decided to scrapbook her childhood memories for her kids to see.
meanings.sent3: He would scrapbook his cooking disasters as a reminder of what not to do.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like scrapbooking moments in time, preserving them for eternity.
meanings.sent5: The artist would scrapbook her emotions onto the canvas, creating a masterpiece of feelings.
